DOC.brief_summary: Overactive bladder cause urinary frequency , urgency case urgency incontinence . This study test efficacy transcutaneous tibial nerve stimulation ( use skin patch electrodes via transcutaneous electrical nerve stimulation ( TENS ) machine ) treatment woman clinical symptom overactive bladder .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Transcutaneous Nerve Stimulation OAB
DOC.criteria: 1 . Female , > 18 year age , clinical diagnosis overactive bladder . 2 . Failure behavioral measure pharmacologic therapy adequately control overactive bladder symptom . 3 . Baseline patient perception bladder condition score 2 high . 1 . Current previous percutaneous sacral neuromodulation therapy 2 . Stress predominant urinary incontinence 3 . Newly add bladder medication dose change last 2 month ( Tamsulosin , Silodosin , Alfuzosin , Terazosin , Baclofen , Diazepam , amitriptyline , imipramine , DDAVP , tolterodine , oxybutynin , fesoterodine , darifenacin , solifenacin , trospium , mirabegron ) 4 . Intravesical botulinum toxin use within last 1 year 5 . Implanted pacemaker defibrillator 6 . History epilepsy 7 . Unable unwilling commit study treatment schedule 8 . Pregnant , possible pregnancy plan duration study period 9 . Active skin disease low leg ( dermatitis , cellulitis , eczema , trauma ) 10 . Documented allergy patch electrode adhesive 11 . Abnormal sensory function lower limb 12 . Metallic implant within low limb
